name: PowerBall (itch) (Elliott_Schultz)
description:
Welcome to PowerBall, a game about transmitting power using a rolling ball to repower a futuristic city after a black-out. You are an electrician in a cyberpunk inspired city and to make your job more fun, your higher-ups have made restoring power into a game. Reconnect power using colored electricity. Combine colors to meet the requirements for different power plants and hole connections.

Read the ReadMe for a more in depth guide to the mechanics and level solutions.

Controls:

Movement: WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Stick

Rotate Camera: ZX/NM/Left Trigger-Right Trigger

Reset: R/Circle/B

Pause: Escape/Start

Credits: 

Game: Meghan & Elliott

Music: 'I-Robot2' from DL Sounds https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/i-robot2-loop/

Background: Cyberpunk city from Google. Artist unknown https://w.wallhaven.cc/full/13/wallhaven-13ypx1.png
